text: Ezɨ e Kraisɨn adarazir gumazir igharazir mam uaghan anemadazɨma, an aning ko zui. E dughiar avɨribar ingangarir guar avɨriba a ganɨga an garima, a gavgavigha deragha dagh ami. A bar fo, ia bar arazir aghuibara damuam. Kamaghɨn datɨrɨghɨn a ingangarir kam damuasa bar ifonge.8:22 E aveghbuar, Taitus ko Korinɨn mangasava amir kamningɨn ziamning, e deragha aning gɨfozir puvatɨ. Pol ves 18 ko 20ɨn mavɨn gun mɨkeme. Egha igharazitav Pol ves 22ɨn an gun mɨkeme.
